#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

char str[10000100], twin1[10000100], twin2[10000100];

int main(void)
{
	int T, i, L, a, b;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);
	
	while(T--)
	{
		int foo[200]={0};
		a=b=0;
		i=0;
		
		scanf("%s",str);
		L=strlen(str);
		
		while(i<L)
		{
			if(foo[str[i]]%2 == 0)
			{
				foo[str[i]]++;
				twin1[a++]=str[i];
			}
			else
			{
				twin2[b++]=str[i];
				foo[str[i]]++;
			}
        	i++;
		}
		twin1[a]='\0';
		twin2[b]='\0';
		
		if(strcmp(twin1, twin2)==0)
		{
			printf("%s\n",twin1);
		}
		else
		{
			printf("Twins don't exist\n");
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
